## FallbackErrorStrategy.handle() method

Handles unexpected errors by logging and returning a generic 500 response.

**Signature:**

```typescript
handle(err: Error, res: Response): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

err


</td><td>

Error


</td><td>

The unexpected error


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

res


</td><td>

Response


</td><td>

Express response object


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void

## Example


```typescript
// This strategy handles any error that reaches it:
// - Programming errors
// - Third-party library errors
// - Database connection errors
// - Any unanticipated error types
```
